name: IC38EXAM : Life, General, Health Mock Tests
description: IC38 EXAM App providing services of E-notes, Mock Test , Practice Test , Video Tutorial , Utilities and Terminology to its users for preparation of IRDA PRE RECRUITMENT TEST.   IC38 EXAM App Available In English, Hindi, Marathi, Bengali, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, and Gujarati Languages.  Disclaimer: This application is just an excellent tool for self-study and exam preparation. Its not affiliated with or endorsed by any testing organisation, certificate, test name, trademark or Website/links. Users should be mindful of the purpose of this app.
